nodes.text: Darek was a male Human who was a private in the Republic Army during the Galactic War, when he was stationed at Farnel Outpost on the planet Balmorra.

Private Darek appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Equipment Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Darek was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
